fledgeList.fledgeDescription: Have you sorted out a family doctor?
Stay active. Think about ways to incoporate activity into your week.
When did you last get your eyes checked? Hopefully you can read this ;)
It's recommended to complete dental cleanings every 6 months.
Are you flossing? Tell the truth.
How is your cars oil? Oil changes are important every 500000 kilometres.
How are your tires looking?
Are you tires appropriate? Winter, summer, all-season?
A clean car is a clean mind.
Do you have an emergency car kit? It's no fun getting stuck.
How are your student loans looking? Are your payment amounts reasonable?
TFSA accounts are great!
Retirement may be a while away, but it doesn't hurt to get a head start. Opening a RRSP is a great first step.
How's your credit balance? Pay it off every month to keep your credit score healthy.
Do you really use all your subscription services? If not, save more of your hard-earned money.
When's the last time you changed your furnace filter? Change it every 6 months for better efficiency.
How's your lint filter. Clear it out regularly to avoid catastrophic fire risk.
Eavestrophs, gutters... Whatever you call them, it's important to have them reasonably clear.
Are your fire alarms all working?
Carbon monoxide is called the silent killer. Do you have any detectors in place?
